data.title: Crane Counter Balance Weight
data.constraints:
The mass of the object is a positive number
The counterweight mass is an integer
data.stubGenerator:
read craneASCIIRepresentation:string(50)
write is it that heavy ?
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> one line representing an ASCII crane with a mass, a fulcrum, arms and a counterweight
data.outputDescription: The weight of the counterweight as an integer

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You must output the counterweight needed for a crane to uplift a given mass.

The crane is represented in ASCII:

* the mass of the object to lift will be a positive number
* a part of the arm of the crane is represented with _
* the fulcrum is represented by /\
* the counterweight is represented by ?
Input
Line 1 : one line representing an ASCII crane with a mass, a fulcrum, arms and a counterweight
Output
The weight of the counterweight as an integer
Constraints
The mass of the object is a positive number
The counterweight mass is an integer
Example
Input
4_/\_?
Output
4
